Foot & Ankle Surgical Expertise: Providing Relief and Mobility

Welcome to your path towards healthy feet and ankles!

Our Services:

  • Foot and Ankle Trauma: We treat a variety of acute injuries, including fractures, sprains, dislocations, and soft tissue injuries.
  • Bunions and Hammertoes: We offer minimally invasive and traditional surgical options to correct these common deformities.
  • Arthritis Management: We provide various treatment options for different types of arthritis affecting the foot and ankle, including total ankle replacement and ankle fusion
  • Sports Injuries: We address sports-related injuries, including Achilles tendonitis, plantar fasciitis, and stress fractures.
  • Foot and Ankle Reconstruction: We perform complex reconstructive surgeries to restore function and stability to the foot and ankle.
  • Diabetic Foot Care: We offer specialized care to prevent and manage complications associated with diabetes, including neuropathy and wound healing problems.
  • Nail Care: We treat ingrown toenails, fungal infections, and other nail problems.

Why Choose San Marcos Orthopedics for your foot and ankle care?

  • Advanced Techniques: We utilize the latest surgical techniques and technologies to provide minimally invasive and effective treatments.
  • Personalized Care: We take the time to understand your individual needs and develop a personalized treatment plan.
  • Compassionate Approach: We are committed to providing compassionate and patient-centered care.

Schedule an Appointment Today!

We understand that experiencing foot and ankle pain can be debilitating. We encourage you to schedule an appointment with Dr. Saini or Dr. McDonnell to discuss your concerns and explore the best treatment options available.
